meanings.definition: A slang term for something of high quality or excellence.
meanings.sent1: That new bike is real chiz!
meanings.sent2: The movie we watched last night was total chiz.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe how chiz this pizza tastes!
meanings.sent4: Her artwork is like pure chiz, so impressive.
meanings.sent5: The chiz of his performance left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: I chiz when he said he saw a unicorn.
meanings.sent2: She always chizzes whenever I tell her ghost stories.
meanings.sent3: Don't chiz me, I'm telling the truth!
meanings.sent4: His excuse was so unbelievable, I had to chiz.
meanings.sent5: The detective chizzed the suspect's alibi.

meanings.sent1: I love adding chiz to my sandwiches.
meanings.sent2: The pizza was covered in gooey chiz.
meanings.sent3: The mouse snuck into the kitchen to steal some chiz.
meanings.sent4: The chiz on the charcuterie board was a hit at the party.
